FunctionLayer

Class LogicFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • FunctionLayer.LogicFacade

  • public class LogicFacade
extends Object
    The purpose of the LogicFacade class is to facilitate the "facade layer" between the FunctionLayer and the DataLayer.
    Author:
